rooms.description: Spacious area for family gatherings, well-lit with natural light from east side ensuring positive energy according to Vastu.
Connected seamlessly with the living room and kitchen; ideally positioned for social interaction.
Functional layout ensuring efficient workflow, positioned in the south-east corner to harness auspicious energy according to Vastu.
Spacious and serene, facing north-east for calm energy. Ideal master suite with attached bathroom.
Cozy bedroom designed to maintain privacy, positioned adjacent to living spaces.
Compact design suitable for smaller family members or guests; integrated with the main layout.
Additional bedroom ensuring sufficient space allocation, oriented to receive positive energy from the west.
Personal bathroom attached to master bedroom, ensuring privacy and convenience. Designed for minimal water stagnation.

openings.description: Primary entry facing north to welcome positive energy according to Vastu. Well-lit and inviting.
Garage door for two-car capacity, positioned on the west side in accordance with plot orientation and ensuring clear traffic flow.

garages.description: Dedicated two-car garage located on the west side of the plot, ensuring efficient access and storage.

vastu_compliance.notes: The design integrates Vastu principles by aligning key spaces with auspicious directions and ensuring proper circulation of energy.
